description:
Viola desperately wants to summon a phoenix, and then she desperately wants a familiar. But is she really ready for the responsibility?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nakayoshi Oyako no Dekoboko Jijou / Fushigi na Inochi no Kyouiku Jijou
The Irregular Circumstances of the Close-Knit Family / The Educational Circumstances of the Mysterious Life Form
なかよし親子のでこぼこ事情 / 不思議な命の教育事情
